extendedInfo.description: Can you identify the Country's flag? Test your knowledge of the flags  of the World in Know Your Flags. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn each Country's flags as you play. Keep Score on how well you know your flags.You can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct flag from 4 different pictures.* Choose the correct flag clue from the picture.* Flashcards - View different pictures of flags to help you at identifying which Country has which flag.The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.Keywords: Quiz, Test, Trivia, School, Learn, Learning, Scoreloop, Game, Flashcards, World, Nation, Country, Flag
